projects.title: NxtWatch Platform
projects.description: React-based video streaming application that mimics platforms like YouTube
projects.fullDescription: Nxt Watch, is a React-based video streaming application that mimics platforms like YouTube. It’s designed to help learners apply key frontend development concepts in a real-world scenario.
features: Uses JWT tokens to validate user credentials.
Fetches video data from backend APIs.
Manages saved videos, theme toggling (light/dark), and user session.
Reusable components for headers, sidebars, video cards, and loaders.
CSS-based styling with responsive design across devices.
Displays fallback UI for failed API calls.

projects.title: Jobby App
projects.description: Interactive job search platform with authentication and dynamic filtering
projects.fullDescription: Jobby App is a responsive job search application built using React.js. It simulates a real-world job portal with secure login authentication, multiple navigable routes, and dynamic job listings fetched from APIs. Users can filter jobs by employment type, salary range, and keyword search. The app includes detailed job views, failure handling for API errors, and a custom 404 page. It’s a comprehensive frontend project that demonstrates routing, protected views, and stateful UI components.
features: Secure login authentication with JWT
Home and Jobs routes with dynamic listings
Job details view with similar job suggestions
Filtering by employment type and salary range
Keyword-based job search
Failure views and retry options for API errors
Responsive design across devices
Custom 404 Not Found route

projects.title: Twitter Clone App
projects.description: Backend-focused social media API with authentication and tweet operations
projects.fullDescription: Twitter Clone is a backend application built using Node.js and Express, designed to replicate core functionalities of Twitter. It uses a SQLite database with five interconnected tables: user, follower, tweet, reply, and like. The app supports user registration and login with JWT authentication, and includes protected routes for viewing feeds, followers, tweet details, likes, replies, and tweet creation or deletion. It demonstrates robust API design, middleware for token verification, and secure access control.
features: User registration and login with JWT authentication
Protected routes with middleware for token verification
Tweet feed showing latest posts from followed users
View followers and following lists
Detailed tweet view with likes and replies
Create and delete tweets securely
Access control for viewing and modifying tweets
Structured database with normalized relationships

projects.title: Nxt Trends
projects.description: An e-commerce platform similar to Amazon and Flipkart.
projects.fullDescription: Nxt Trendz is a comprehensive e-commerce solution built with React. It features user authentication, product listings, a shopping cart, and a responsive user interface. This project was developed as a part of the Nxt Wave curriculum to demonstrate proficiency in modern front-end technologies.
features: User authentication with login and registration.
Product browsing with sorting and filtering options.
Shopping cart functionality to add, remove, and manage items.
Responsive design for seamless user experience across devices.
Secure routing to protect application pages.
Persists user login state using browser cookies.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts and data visualization
projects.fullDescription: An intuitive weather dashboard that provides comprehensive weather information with beautiful data visualizations. Features include location-based weather data, 7-day forecasts, interactive charts, weather maps, and the ability to save favorite locations for quick access.
features: Current weather conditions
7-day weather forecast
Interactive charts and graphs
Location-based weather data
Favorite locations management
Responsive design with dark/light themes
